pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Blonde Anti-Yellow Toning Blonde Toner 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care Blonde Toner is formulated with ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with intense violet pigments to neutralise yellow & brassy tones. With OMEGAPLEX ANTIBREAKAGE
TECHNOLOGY + BLUEBERRY EXTRACT for hair repair & stronger hair

Your blonde, bleached or highlighted hair can become subject to
unwanted brassy and yellow tones and the hair can feel dry and
damaged. It requires special care to neutralise these unwanted tones
while repairing the hair for a cooler colour result and stronger hair.

EXTRA CARE BLONDE TONER offers:
+ ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY FOR NEUTRALISATION OF YELLOW
& BRASSY TONES
+ OMEGAPLEX ANTI-BREAKAGE TECHNOLOGY FOR STRONGER
HAIR
+ VISIBLY IMPROVED HAIR QUALITY WITH INTENSE SHINE

Extra Care Blonde Toner contains ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with
intense violet pigments to revive and brighten gold, blonde and naturally grey
hair for a cooler result.

Made in Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: Blonde, Bleached or Highlighted Hair

Size: 250mL

Hair Type: Blonde, Bleached or Highlighted Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Neutralises Yellow & Brassy Tones, with Anti-Breakage Technology
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN, ADVANCED HAIR
TECHNOLOGY & NATURAL ACTIVES help repair existing
damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair
quality.
• Extra Care Blonde Toner contains ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with
intense violet pigments to revive and brighten gold, blonde and naturally grey
hair for a cooler result.

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-8, Coconut Alcohol, Cetearth-20, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Methylparaben, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Polyquaternium-6, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Glycerin
· Magnesium Chloride, Linalool, Acid Violet 43, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, HC Blue No.12, Amodimethicone/Morpholinomethyl Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Linalyl Acetate, Sodium Chloride, Limonene, Trideceth-5, Magnesium Citrate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, HC Blue No.16, Potassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid

Directions

Apply a generous amount into wet hair. Leave in for up to 3 minutes, depending on the desired result. Rinse thoroughly after application. We recommend using gloves with this product as staining may occur. Use regularly depending on the desired neutralisation level. Keep out of reach of children.
SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS: This product is not recommended for highly bleached or
very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent
surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Tube & Cap are Kerbside Recyclable. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
